title: Bonk's New Bike
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 323 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 500L, Fiction Series
description: Bonk dreams of a new bike, but he doesn't have enough money to buy it. To earn the money, he decides to start a dog-walking business. Bonks friends volunteer to help him, but he wants to put all the money toward his new bike. Bonk's business is very successful, and in the end he is forced to ask his friends for help. Like true friends, they all work together to make Bonk's dream come true.
